Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

OutboundCallerConfig.description: The outbound caller ID name, number, and outbound whisper flow.

OutboundFlowArn.description: The outbound whisper flow to be used during an outbound call.

QuickConnectArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the quick connect.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: HoursOfOperationArn
properties.description: The identifier for the hours of operation.

type.description: The identifier for the hours of operation.

properties.name: InstanceArn
properties.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

type.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

properties.name: MaxContacts
properties.description: The maximum number of contacts that can be in the queue before it is considered full.

type.description: The maximum number of contacts that can be in the queue before it is considered full.

properties.name: OutboundCallerConfig
properties.description: The outbound caller ID name, number, and outbound whisper flow.

type.description: The outbound caller ID name, number, and outbound whisper flow.

properties.name: QuickConnectArns
properties.description: The quick connects available to agents who are working the queue.

type.description: The quick connects available to agents who are working the queue.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: QueueArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the queue.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the queue.
